EmailTemplate.name: DRE-AbbVie RWE poster
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you see the Celebration of Science RWE Meta-Analysis poster?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Celebration of Science RWE Meta-Analysis poste|*
Did you see the Celebration of Science RWE Meta-Analysis poster?
Please see a great example of a DRE/AbbVie collaboration in the therapeutic area of HCV. Click on the poster to review further.
Users can now log in thrugh AbbVie's single Sign On portal at: https://federation.abbvie.com/idp/startSSO.ping?PartnerSpId=dre-launch:saml2:sp
